title: Audio Engineering
description: Concepts of acoustics and electroacoustic modeling for the analysis and design of microphones, loudspeakers, and crossover networks. Methods of analysis and design of audio power amplifiers.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: (ECE 3040 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or ECE 3741 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D) and ECE 3084 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C
